INSERT INTO TRAINER_VIDEO (CONTENT_NUM,TRAINER_ID,POST_DT,CONTENT,VIEWS,IP_ADD,UPDATE_DT,DELETE_DT,STATUS,ATCH_ID) VALUES(#contentNum#,#trainerId#,SYSDATE,#content#,#views#,#ipAdd#,#updateDt#,#deleteDt#,#status#,#atchId#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CONTENT_NUM as CONTENT_NUM, A.TRAINER_ID as TRAINER_ID, A.POST_DT AS POST_DT, A.CONTENT AS CONTENT, A.VIEWS AS VIEWS, A.STATUS AS STATUS, B.FILE_PATH AS FILE_PATH, B.FILE_EXTNS AS FILE_EXTNS, B.ATCH_ID AS ATCH_ID, B.SAVE_NM AS SAVE_NM, B.ORGNL_NM AS ORGNL_NM FROM TRAINER_VIDEO A, ATCH_FILE_DETAIL B WHERE A.ATCH_ID = B.ATCH_ID AND A.TRAINER_ID = #trainerId# ORDER BY 3 DESC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TRAINER_VIDEO SET TRAINER_ID = #trainerId#, DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CONTENT_NUM = #contentNum#
UPDATE TRAINER_VIDEO SET CONTENT = #content#, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE, IP_ADD = #ipAdd#, ATCH_ID = #atchId# WHERE CONTENT_NUM = #contentNum#
